segments.text: I feel so bad for the woman because she’s about to have a huge mess on her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are taking cookies, and she’s completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s going to be so upset when she finally realizes what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, and the girl is just standing there, waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman is tired or just really focused on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting so wet, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the kids should tell her about the water before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, but inside, it’s just sadness waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees what’s going on.
segments.speaker: PAR
